title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid username and password
expectedResult: User should be successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: User Registration Form Validation
description: Test form validation for user registration with invalid inputs
expectedResult: Appropriate validation errors should be displayed for each invalid field

title: Product Search Functionality
description: Verify that product search returns relevant results
steps: Enter product name in search box
expectedResult: Search results should display products matching the search criteria

title: Shopping Cart Add Item
description: Test adding items to shopping cart
expectedResult: Selected product should appear in cart with correct quantity and price

title: Password Reset Email
expectedResult: Password reset email should be received within 5 minutes
